task.title: Purchasing Schedule Items [DRAFT]
task.abstract:
Once a user has been registered for an event via the Community Portal, they are eligible to purchase additional schedule items.
Prerequisites:Registered as a single/group registrant, email sent

step.cmd: Open the email titled "Event Registration" and click the link included in the body of the email. This link will take the user to a page with interview questions related to the purchased ticket type.
Complete the required questions as well as any optional questions as needed. Click Submit. The Agenda Builder for the event will display, with the purchased ticket type at the top of the page.

Select the available dates of the event at the top of the page to navigate through the list of schedule items from which to build the agenda. There is a legend with the symbols that indicate whether the schedule items are "Scheduled" or already added, "Waitlist" if the schedule item has waitlisting enabled, and "Full" if the user is unable to add the schedule item to the agenda.

View the cost, description, speakers, and other available information by clicking the item. Then select the schedule item by clicking the Add button below the item information. To delete the item, click the Remove button.
Once all needed schedule items have been added, click Continue. The login page will display.
To continue to the checkout page as a guest, enter First Name, Last Name, and email. Click Continue.
On the next page, complete the shipping information. Note: Only the Mailing State/Province field is required. There is also the option to create an account on this page.
Click Continue to go to the Checkout page. Enter payment information and click the Pay button. Note: This payment method can be saved for future use.

taskbody.result:
A receipt page will display with the following:
Receipt Number
Date of purchase
Customer
Line Description for purchased item(s)
Memo with Sales Order number
Total Paid The Sales Order will be closed and posted, with a Sales Order Line for each purchased item. A new record will appear in the Registered Attendees related list on the Schedule Item's Detail page, with the Sales Order (Source) ID linking the registered attendee back to the related sales order.
